titles.title: To designate the Federal Justice Building in Miami, Florida, as the "James Lawrence King Federal Justice Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Designates the Federal Justice Building located at 99 Northeast Fourth Street in Miami, Florida, as the James Lawrence King Federal Justice Building.
